name: ACHIEVE Model
description: The ACHIEVE Model is a comprehensive coaching framework that emphasizes goal achievement through seven stages: Assess, Creative brainstorming, Hone goals, Initiate options, Evaluate options, Validate plan, and Execute.

innovative_ideas.title: What innovative ideas come to mind?

specific_goals.title: What exactly do you want to achieve?

goal_importance.title: Why is this goal important to you?
goal_importance.description: Explore the significance and motivation behind the goal

initial_actions.title: What actions can you start taking?

achievable_steps.title: Which steps feel most achievable right now?
achievable_steps.description: Prioritize the most realistic and achievable actions

practical_options.title: Which options are most practical?
practical_options.description: Evaluate the practicality of different options

pros_and_cons.title: What are the pros and cons of each?
pros_and_cons.description: Analyze the advantages and disadvantages of each option

plan_confidence.title: How confident are you in this plan?
plan_confidence.description: Assess confidence level in the chosen plan

first_steps.title: What specific steps will you take first?

progress_tracking.title: How will you track progress and accountability?
progress_tracking.description: Establish methods for monitoring progress and maintaining accountability
